channel.title: Psr2 on DevLog
channel.description: Recent content in Psr2 on DevLog

item.title: PSR PhpStorm settings
item.description: PhpStorm has a built-in support for PSR1/2 standards, it can easily be enabled in the Preferences menu. Type Code Style in the search box if you can’t see it Then select PHP from the sub-menu. Now, practically hidden in the right upper corner, there’s a link (button?) Set from… It’s unclear why such a widely used setting is a floating writing in the interface. Select Predefined Styles > PSR1/PSR2 Click Apply/OK
